name: Final Room
description:
Final Room is a game about an elder who cannot leave this room for being too sick. His whole life basically revolves around the same area.

This game came to be when thinking about how it would feel having to rely on someone else for even the most basic needs. The game was made for Ludum Dare 37, with "one room" being the theme.

Controls: mouse

If the game is not running OK via the web option, try maximizing it.
